title: 2020 Fed Transcripts Show How Powell Sold Fateful Rate Guidance
description: Transcripts of the Federal Reserve’s 2020 policy meetings, made public Friday, revealed new details about how Chair Jerome Powell pushed for a change he would later regret.
content: Transcripts of the Federal Reserve’s 2020 policy meetings, made public Friday, revealed new details about how Chair Jerome Powell pushed for a change he would later regret.
